title: The most refreshing lane I've had in a long long long time!

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
No Zed or Yasuo, or Viktor or Ori, or Katarina or any of that other monotonous assassin/faker-fan-club crap.

Just two proper champions duking it out in the mid lane. A proper lane where no-one burst down the other in 0.1 seconds, or shadow-dashed to safety from a "guaranteed" tower-death. But instead just thew spells at each other, traded damage, took CS, denied CS, fought, retreated, engaged, killed, and died.

it was glorious! 

a lane where for once, making a small mistake didn't cost you your life, a lane where when there was a full on fight, both parties still had enough HP to continue with the lane afterwards. A lane where no BS was called from ether side.

Power vs Defence!

AP vs MR!

New vs Old! 

Dragon vs Golem!


I just wish others could take a break from the constant monotony of Crit swordsmen, and Shadow assassins, and experience the bliss of a true uncorrupted mid lane, the way it was meant to be!
